restaurants.name: Laxmi Misthan Bhandar (LMB)
restaurants.description: Enjoy traditional Rajasthani sweets and snacks.

restaurants.name: Tapri Central
restaurants.description: Enjoy tea, snacks, and light meals with a modern twist.

attractions.name: City Palace
attractions.description: Visit the City Palace, a beautiful complex showcasing a blend of Rajasthani and Mughal architecture. Explore the museums within the palace.
attractions.notes: Best to visit early in the morning or late afternoon to avoid the midday heat. Indoor sections offer respite from the heat.

attractions.name: Hawa Mahal
attractions.description: See the iconic Hawa Mahal (Palace of Winds). Take photos from outside or explore the museum inside.
attractions.notes: Primarily an external viewing attraction, but the museum inside is small and provides a cooler environment.

attractions.name: Shopping at Bapu Bazaar
attractions.description: Explore Bapu Bazaar for traditional Rajasthani textiles, handicrafts, and jewelry. Bargaining is expected.
attractions.notes: Look for shaded areas and shops with air conditioning to escape the heat. Carry water.

attractions.name: Amer Fort
attractions.description: Visit Amer Fort, a magnificent fort located on a hill. Opt for a jeep ride or walk up. Explore the palace complex, including the Sheesh Mahal (Mirror Palace).
attractions.notes: Visit early in the morning to avoid the scorching sun. There are indoor sections within the fort that offer some relief.

attractions.name: Jaigarh Fort
attractions.description: Visit Jaigarh Fort, overlooking Amer Fort. See the world's largest cannon on wheels and enjoy panoramic views.
attractions.notes: Can be extremely hot during the day, plan to visit early morning/late afternoon.

attractions.name: Albert Hall Museum
attractions.description: Visit Albert Hall Museum, the oldest museum in Rajasthan, showcasing a collection of artifacts and artworks.
attractions.notes: Offers an excellent indoor escape from the heat, with air-conditioned spaces.

attractions.name: Galtaji Temple (Monkey Temple)
attractions.description: Visit the Galtaji Temple, known for its natural springs and temples. Be cautious of monkeys.
attractions.notes: Best visited early morning or late afternoon. Mostly outdoors, but some shaded areas are available. Be aware of monkeys.
